description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 20/02037/HOU (Erection of part single storey, part two storey rear extensions with associated changes to east elevation fenestration. Rear dormer roof extension with installation of 1no rooflight). Amendment to include alterations to side boundary fence and wall, timber decking with access to hot tub area
decision_conditions: The proposal, by reason of the lowering of the boundary fence and the introduction of new raised platforms, may have a material impact on the living conditions of neighouring occupiers in terms of of loss of privacy.  Therefore, the Council considers the amendments to be material.
Please provide 'Time Stamp Photo'. It is validation requirement.
